mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Golden Rondelle Theater was originally built as the SC Johnson Pavilion for the 1964-65 New York World's Fair. After the Fair was over, The Golden Rondelle was dismantled and its steel framework was shipped back to Racine, where it was re-designed by Taliesin Associated Architects. -- https://greaterracinecounty.com/listing/golden-rondelle-theater/ [work]
